titleStmt.title: J. Bates Dickson, Special Orders, No. 65
CWG14258

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: Flat Storage Box: 11th Ky Cav (US) Muster Rolls, Bundle 6

body.p:
Department of the Ohio,
Branch Office, Adjutant General's Department,
Lexington, Kentucky, March 8th, 1864.
Special Orders,
No. 65 }
[Extract.]

4,, The resignation of Surgeon James H. Peyton 11th Ky. Vol. Cav. is hereby accepted, to take effect March 8th, 1864, with the condition that he shall receive no final payments until he has satisfied the Pay Department that he is in no wise indebted to the Government.

By Command of Major General Schofield:
J. Bates Dickson
Assistant Adjutant General.

11 Cavy
James H. Peyton
Surgeon
Order accepting
Resignation
Recd A. G. O. Mar 9. 1864
